resources.string: Rule 1 \n In each row and column of a Binoxxo there must be equally many X and O. If the Binoxxo has 8 columns and 8 rows, there must be 4 X and 4 O in each row and column.

Rule 2 \n No more than 2 equal symbols are allowed next to each other. Meaning, no more than 2 X or 2 O following each other. If for example there are 3 X next to each other in the Binoxxo (in a row or a column) it is invalid.
Rule 3 \n All rows must be unique and all columns must be unique. If there are two identical rows or two identical columns, the Binoxxo is invalid.
